items.name: Nanyuki Equator Crossing Point
items.short_description: Stand with one foot in the Northern Hemisphere and one in the Southern! This iconic marker offers a unique photo opportunity at the world's waistline.
items.location_hint: Nanyuki-Meru Highway, just north of Nanyuki town

items.name: Barney's Bar & Restaurant at Fairmont Mt Kenya Safari Club
items.short_description: Indulge in exquisite cuisine with stunning views of Mount Kenya. This iconic spot offers a blend of local flavors and international dishes in a sophisticated setting.

items.name: Nanyuki Open Air Market
items.short_description: Dive into the vibrant chaos of Nanyuki's bustling local market. Discover fresh produce, unique crafts, and experience the authentic pulse of everyday life.
items.location_hint: Nanyuki Town Center, near the main bus station

items.name: Nanyuki Railway Station (Old)
items.short_description: Step back in time at this historic railway station, a remnant of colonial-era Kenya's transport network. Its classic architecture offers a glimpse into Nanyuki's past.
items.location_hint: Southern end of Nanyuki town, near the railway line
